content: october fingerless mitts cast on 44 48 sts with color a divide sts onto 3 dpn as follows designed by diana mckay & leslie taylor needle 1 16 16 sts corvallis mt needle 2 16 16 sts needle 3 12 16 sts fall is the perfect time to knit mitts the join without twisting temperature is dropping and winter is on the pattern stitch work around in k2 p2 rib way perfect for yourself or holiday gift giving regular skein-- work the pattern stitch for 7 gradient pack work as follows work pattern stitch until mitt measures 1 5 then drop color a without cutting yarn and k2 p2 in color b for one round grab color a and knit one round then break off color a because you are done with it change back to color b and work 1 5 work one round with color c one round with color b cut b and then work 1 5 of color c work one round with color d one round with color c cut c and continue with color d for 1 5 materials 1 skein mt colors twizzle or perspective gradient pack in twizzle 36 of contrasting waste yarn needles size 4 double-pointed needles dpn or size needed to obtain gauge gauge 11sts = 2 in st st size medium large cuff this pattern was written for 1 skein of twizzle or a mini-skein perspective gradient pack if using a perspectives pack select and label colors a b c d and e there will be 5 color changes if using 1 skein of twizzle yarn then disregard the color changes there will be no color changes beg thumb opening at beginning of next round using contrasting waste yarn k7 slip these 7 contrasting sts back onto the left needle and work them in pattern using project yarn in full skein color or color d knit one round with color e one round with color d break color d and continue with color e for 1 5 or until 2 above thumb opening bind off loosely in rib break yarn and weave in tails thumb gently unpick the waste yarn and pick up the live stitches you will have 6 sts above the opening and 7 sts below join yarn in color of your choice and k1 p1 across bottom needle pick up and p1 sts in space between upper and lower needles continue k1 p1 across upper needle pick up and k1 p1 2 sts between needles for a total of 16 sts continue this ribbing up the thumb for 1 bind off loosely when weaving in yarn tail close any gaps at the base of the thumb block lightly and enjoy
